item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Gati. Welcome to my personal site! I’m currently a software engineering student at Olin College of Engineering in Needham, MA. I am passionate about data analysis, machine learning, natural language processing, computer vision, and good software practices. If you are curious about my professional experience, see my CV.

item.title: Understanding 1D and 2D FFT
item.description: Diagrams and explanations that helped me understand Fourier Transforms for signal and image analysis.
